oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Confederate veterans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of eleven Confederate veterans from Marion County, Tennessee. Possibly taken at either the Marion County courthouse or the Pryor Institute in Jasper, Tennessee. Samuel Hunter Bennett, Co. H, 4th Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA, is pictured at the center,; sixth from the left.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bennett, Samuel Hunter
